_comment_general: // This JSON is the input file for the filters used inside the filterEmails function located inside server.ts.
_comment_general_two: // Below you can find filtering options that can be included before calling filterEmails.
_comment_general_three: // All the properties below that start with _ are just comments for the next line and should not be accessed inside the project.
_comment_general_four: // If you want to add a new filter, for example 'cc', replace the placeholder (user@example.com in this case), then go in server.ts and add cc:${messagesFilterOptions.q.cc} anywhere inside the string stored on q key, on line 68.

q._comment_cc_bcc: // Recipients in the CC or BCC field
q.subject: email
q._comment_before: // Search for messages sent before a certain date. Provide a date using the following format: YYYY/MM/DD
q._comment_after: // Search for messages sent after a certain date. Provide a date using the following format: YYYY/MM/DD

_comment_maxResults: // Limit the number of results that will be displayed.
_comment_other_search_operators: https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7190 - Here you can find all the search operators that you can use.
